title: SAWTober 2020 Discussion
author: Reel Talk
comment: I liked Strahm in Saw 4, at least for a little bit toward the end (like him interrogating Jill), and he did give himself a tracheotomy with a pen in 5... but honestly in Saw 5, I felt like his entire character was just telling us a lot that we already knew. He was really smart of course, and I do like him, but I can understand why you put him where you did.
Strahm is the most bad-ass good guy in the whole franchise. Come on
description:
Jacob and I take some time to discuss our decision process for this years SAWTober.

Today, we are gathering to pay tribute to Josiah Black who played Edgar Munsen in 2017's Jigsaw. Earlier this year, Josiah passed away, leaving behind his wife, daughter and unborn child. Given the decade that this year has been, we wanted to see what we could do to help his family by honoring his memory and raising a little money in the process.

I know times our tough right now but anything will help. All benefits will go directly to Josiah's wife and donations can get you some cool SAW stuff!
